languages.text: "Этот объект был выращен мной специально для тебя, мон-кай. Он дурманил твои убогие органы чувств во время допроса, чтобы избежать излишнего сопротивления. Любопытный эксперимент — обычно я извлекаю контролирующих червей из образцов посмертно. Тебе свойственна телесная стойкость".

"I grew this specimen specifically for you, mon-keigh. During your interrogation, it intoxicated your feeble senses to limit unnecessary resistance. What a curious experiment it was. I usually extract control worms from specimens posthumously. You possess some degree of bodily fortitude."
languages.original_text: "Этот объект был выращен мной специально для тебя, мон-кай. Он дурманил твои убогие органы чувств во время допроса, чтобы избежать излишнего сопротивления. Любопытный эксперимент — обычно я извлекаю контролирующих червей из образцов посмертно. Тебе свойственна телесная стойкость".

traits.locale_text: "I grew this specimen just for you, mon-keigh. It intoxicated your feeble sensory organs during the interrogation to limit your ability to resist. This was a curious experiment. I usually extract control worms out of specimens posthumously. You possess some degree of bodily resilience."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

I usually extract control worms out of specimens posthumously. You possess some degree of bodily resilience."

traits.locale_text: "I grew this specimen specifically for you, mon-keigh. During your interrogation, it intoxicated your feeble senses to limit unnecessary resistance. What a curious experiment it was. I usually extract control worms from specimens posthumously. You possess some degree of bodily fortitude."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: « J'ai élevé ce spécimen spécialement pour vous, mon-keigh. Pendant votre interrogatoire, il s'est chargé de brouiller vos sens afin de limiter toute tentative de résistance inutile. C'était une expérience particulièrement intéressante. Généralement, j'extrais les vers de contrôle après le décès de leur hôte. Mais vous semblez disposer d'une résistance exceptionnelle. »
languages.original_text: "I grew this specimen specifically for you, mon-keigh. During your interrogation, it intoxicated your feeble senses to limit unnecessary resistance. What a curious experiment it was. I usually extract control worms from specimens posthumously. You possess some degree of bodily fortitude."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai élevé ce spécimen spécialement pour vous, mon-keigh. Pendant votre interrogatoire, il s'est chargé de brouiller vos sens afin de limiter toute tentative de résistance inutile. C'était une expérience particulièrement intéressante. Généralement, j'extrais les vers de contrôle après le décès de leur hôte. Mais vous semblez disposer d'une résistance exceptionnelle. »
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: “这个样本是我特地为你培育而成的，猴子。当你接受审问的时候，它会麻醉你脆弱的感官，减少不必要的反抗。那真是场有趣的实验。通常而言，我都会从实验对象的尸体中将控制蠕虫提取出来，不过你的身体拥有出色的耐受力。”
languages.original_text: "I grew this specimen specifically for you, mon-keigh. During your interrogation, it intoxicated your feeble senses to limit unnecessary resistance. What a curious experiment it was. I usually extract control worms from specimens posthumously. You possess some degree of bodily fortitude."

traits.locale_text: “这个样本是我特地为你培育而成的，猴子。当你接受审问的时候，它会麻醉你脆弱的感官，减少不必要的反抗。那真是场有趣的实验。通常而言，我都会从实验对象的尸体中将控制蠕虫提取出来，不过你的身体拥有出色的耐受力。”
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: "Ich habe dieses Versuchsstück eigens für Euch gezüchtet, Chem-Pan-Sey. Während Eures Verhörs hat es Eure schwachen Sinne berauscht, um unnötigen Widerstand zu begrenzen. Was war das nur für ein eigenartiges Experiment. Für gewöhnlich extrahiere ich Kontrollwürmer erst posthum wieder aus den Versuchsstücken. Ihr besitzt ein gewisses Maß an körperlicher Widerstandsfähigkeit."
languages.original_text: "I grew this specimen specifically for you, mon-keigh. During your interrogation, it intoxicated your feeble senses to limit unnecessary resistance. What a curious experiment it was. I usually extract control worms from specimens posthumously. You possess some degree of bodily fortitude."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe dieses Versuchsstück eigens für Euch gezüchtet, Chem-Pan-Sey. Während Eures Verhörs hat es Eure schwachen Sinne berauscht, um unnötigen Widerstand zu begrenzen. Was war das nur für ein eigenartiges Experiment. Für gewöhnlich extrahiere ich Kontrollwürmer erst posthum wieder aus den Versuchsstücken. Ihr besitzt ein gewisses Maß an körperlicher Widerstandsfähigkeit."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: «Creé este espécimen para ti, mon-keigh. Hice que intoxicara tus débiles sentidos para evitar que te resistieras en el interrogatorio. Ha sido un experimento bastante curioso. Normalmente extraigo los gusanos de control de los especímenes una vez han fallecido. Pero tu cuerpo aguanta límites insospechados».
languages.original_text: "I grew this specimen specifically for you, mon-keigh. During your interrogation, it intoxicated your feeble senses to limit unnecessary resistance. What a curious experiment it was. I usually extract control worms from specimens posthumously. You possess some degree of bodily fortitude."

traits.locale_text: «Creé este espécimen para ti, mon-keigh. Hice que intoxicara tus débiles sentidos para evitar que te resistieras en el interrogatorio. Ha sido un experimento bastante curioso. Normalmente extraigo los gusanos de control de los especímenes una vez han fallecido. Pero tu cuerpo aguanta límites insospechados».
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: 「この標本は、お前のために特別に育てたんだ、モン＝ケイ。尋問の間、お前の弱々しい感覚を酔わせ、不要な抵抗を抑えるためにな。なんとも不思議な実験だった。普段、私は標本が死んだ後に制御ワームを抽出するんだ。お前は、そこそこ強い体を持っているようだな」
languages.original_text: "I grew this specimen specifically for you, mon-keigh. During your interrogation, it intoxicated your feeble senses to limit unnecessary resistance. What a curious experiment it was. I usually extract control worms from specimens posthumously. You possess some degree of bodily fortitude."

traits.locale_text: 「この標本は、お前のために特別に育てたんだ、モン＝ケイ。尋問の間、お前の弱々しい感覚を酔わせ、不要な抵抗を抑えるためにな。なんとも不思議な実験だった。普段、私は標本が死んだ後に制御ワームを抽出するんだ。お前は、そこそこ強い体を持っているようだな」
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: "Bu numuneyi özellikle senin için büyüttüm mon-keigh. Sorgun sırasında göstereceğin gereksiz direnci sınırlamak için senin o zayıf hislerini zehirledi. İlginç bir deneydi. Genellikle numunelerdeki kontrol kurtlarını ölümden sonra çıkarırım. Önemli ölçüde bedensel dayanıklılığa sahipsin."
languages.original_text: "I grew this specimen specifically for you, mon-keigh. During your interrogation, it intoxicated your feeble senses to limit unnecessary resistance. What a curious experiment it was. I usually extract control worms from specimens posthumously. You possess some degree of bodily fortitude."

traits.locale_text: "Bu numuneyi özellikle senin için büyüttüm mon-keigh. Sorgun sırasında gereksiz direnci sınırlamak adına, senin o zayıf hislerini zehirledi. İlginç bir deneydi. Genellikle numunelerdeki kontrol kurtlarını ölüm sonrasında çıkarırım. Önemli ölçüde bedensel dayanıklılığa sahipsin."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae
